text: Eduard Gaikovich Abalov (born 7 October 1927)Eduard Abalov at the Encyclopedia KM.ruEduard Abalov at kino-teatr.ruEduard Abalov at peoples.ru was a Soviet film actor and director. ==Filmography== ===As director=== * U tikhoi pristani (1958) * Na dalney tochke (1970) * Northern Rhapsody (1974) ===As actor=== * Clean Ponds (1965) * The Cook (1966) * The New Adventures of the Elusive Avengers (1968) * Train Stop – Two Minutes (1972) * Northern Rhapsody (1974) * The Twelve Chairs (1976) – shashlik ==References== ==External links== * Category:1927 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Soviet film directors Category:Soviet male film actors
title: Eduard Abalov
